messages.content: I'd enjoy a nice warm hug. Along with a delightful conversation. But that works too.
I'm happy I live in a country where machete attacks don't have to be a real concern.
Happy to see that you're in recovery
It will be carefully tailored to piss their parents off, which I will enjoy greatly :-)
Yay, coming out is hard, you're lucky that they didnt avoid you for the next month, I'm happy for you
Take a note to PM me if you do, I'll happily pay for one!
Glad I tend to post pics of my cats and not myself.
Glad I took the 1st half spread
My friend and I have been having good fun queuing Mei/Winston, trololo, and 2 bottles of whisky.
That’s how you know they’re happy.
Hunting would at least be more rewarding and fun. Every time I wanna meal prep in RDO I just horseback ride and lock-on to deer.
Well the good news is once all the boomers die off you won't have any pesky old people to blame anymore.
I’m glad I’m not the only one who was pedantic enough to notice.
Those guys are TOUGH. glad to see Blackwater back in business to keep the peace over there
So glad I discovered that subreddit a couple months ago. So good...
Happy? Not really, but glad we can come to a conclusion to my offhand semi in jest reply.
